about_the_game:
LEADER OF A TRIBE

Control the avatar of a chieftain of your tribe. Manage the economy and well-being of your tribesmen by issuing work priorities.

Unlike a traditional RTS game, you control just your avatar using a mouse. You can manage your mighty empire with just one hand and a mouse. Micromanagement of units is not needed; insane APM (Actions per Minute) is not required.



Explore the great wildland that your ancestors have lived in for thousands of years. Track different resources as they bloom and wane over time. Living as a nomad, your tribe will have to pack up and move from time to time to find better resources. Locate suitable land and be prepared to migrate your tribe to a new spot as the seasons change.


Locate and harvest resources like berries, herbs, copper, and tobacco, and convert them into useful tools, trade goods, medicine, and weapons. These items will be useful to your tribe or for trading. Herd horses into your land, and track and hunt bison to increase your food source.


Seek other tribes and outsiders and trade with them. They might offer something that you cannot create. Become friends or allies if they are deemed worthy. The outsiders, with their odd clothing and obsession with lands and buildings, may have more technologically advanced tools and weapons for trade. They also have knowledge that can advance your tribe's survivability and skill trees.



If friendship comes to an end, be prepared to fend off any invaders. Better still, crush them with the might and bravery of your tribe before they settle. War is inevitable.

UNLOCK SKILLS

Trade knowledge with others for new skills. They can unlock the strength of your warriors and livestock.

FINALE

With their military having technological superiority, the outsiders will eventually overwhelm your land and force you out. Lead your tribe to stand your ground and repel them away.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 10 Home 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ I5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia® GeForce™ GTS
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 10 Home 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ I7 930 | AMD® FX 6350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia® GeForce™ GTX 580 (1.5 GB)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes

short_description: Tribe survival game where you control the chief. Manage your tribe, delegate harvesting, hunting, crafting and research. Grow your tribes, engage other tribes or outsiders through trading, alliance or war. All through mouse click.
